document_data.title: Weapons
document_data.realm year: [[1359 DR]]<ref>{{Cite organized play/LC/Inferno in the Living City|17}}<ref group="note" name="date">''Inferno in the Living City'' makes some references to the events of ''[[Nightwatch in the Living City]]'', referring to them as having happened four years prior. As that module has been estimated to be set in [[1355 DR]], that would place the events of ''Inferno'' in 1359 DR.
